name: Shri Vaghaldhara Vibhag Kelavani Mandal

address: Shri Vaghaldhara Vibhag Kelvani Mandal, Near Cancer Hospital, N.H.-8, Vaghaldhara

briefDescription: Shri Vaghaldhara Vibhag Kelavani Mandal, a trust registered under the Bombay Trust Act, 1950, has set up a state of the art Vocational Training Centre (‘VTC’ for short) at Vaghaldhara Ta. & Dist. Valsad for giving training in various employment oriented skills to scheduled Tribe trainees in co-operation with the Tribal Development Department ( D-SAG TDD)  of the state of Gujarat under its Public Private Partnership (PPP) Policy under the aegis of the Chief Minister’s Ten Point Programme.   	VTC Vaghaldhara is providing free technical training with residential facilities preferably to the Scheduled tribe students coming from a class which admittedly has still remained at the lowest ladder of the society economically.
